b'Uhou Renka': b"Ryouhei is suddenly summoned back to his hometown in the countryside. There, he meets Karen the mascot-girl of a lodging house. As he stands entranced by the sight of her bewitching proportions, Nagisa, the sister of Ryouhei's ex-girlfriend and the one who introduced him to Karen, looks on uneasily.\n\n(Source: AniDB)"
